page.title: 18 PEEBLES BELTANE FESTIVAL(1)
page.content: Peebles holds an{annual gathering}in the third week of June. To find out more about it we interviewed Mr. Douglas Edgar who was{Cornet in 1950. We asked him about being cornet and he said it was one of the highlights of his life. He felt himself to be an ambassador for the town,going to other town's festivals as well as being a principal at Peebles.{The Beltane {Queen}is chosen according to school performance and popularity.Every year the Beltane attracts many{visitors}to Peebles and boosts tourism. On{Saturday}of Beltane Week the main events take place. The Queen is crowned on the Parish Church Steps surrounded by costumed children and activities such as sport,a carnival and marching bands take place.
